intro.title: Welcome to Incubator
intro.description-1: The Incubator is an interactive tool to facilitate access to training and provide technical assistance for young people (18 â€“ 30 years old), who lack knowledge and skills related to DRONE Technology.
intro.description-2: The Incubator gives access to young people who wish to acquire new skills and competences in order to establish and/or improve the use of DRONES in their work environments and professional careers. The DRONE Incubator helps the target group aspiring to become acquire the necessary skills, providing information, training and technical assistance in one location.
intro.description-3: This tool provides information which are sought by young people who want to pursue a career or start a new           business with the use of DRONES, which results in improving and expanding the technology careers, drone journalism, filming, video clips, reportage and raising awareness about tools available for modernising the sector and in this way contributing to tackling challenges.

menuDescriptions.modules: The Modules include the new skills and competences of drone technology, resources, materials, training methods and evaluation.  The five Training Modules are specific modules concern the design of the Curricula.
